ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
1 (10 ounce) can RO*TEL Diced Tomatoes and Green Chilies, drained
1 cup KRAFT Mexican Style Finely Shredded Four Cheese

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese to room temperature for smooth blending
Layer ingredients for visual appeal or mix completely for uniform texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you balance the flavors of beans, cheese, and spiced tomatoes in a dip?
